headline.main: 'Real Offensive' in Pacific Believed Opened at Marcus; MARCUS BLOW HELD OPENING OF DRIVE

lead_paragraph: PEARL HARBOR, Sept. 1 -- While direct reports from Pacific Fleet forces now engaged against Marcus Island are lacking because the attack is presumably still going on, observers here believe that this operation in Japan's home patrol area signifies the opening phase of the long-awaited "real offensive" in the Pacific.
